content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Serangoon Gardens Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Serangoon Gardens Single Member Constituency** was a [single member constituency](/wiki/Single-member_district) in Singapore. It was formed in 1959 by carving out from [Serangoon Constituency](/wiki/Serangoon_Constituency) as **Serangoon Gardens Constituency**. In 1976, parts of the constituency was carved out to form [Ang Mo Kio Constituency](/wiki/Ang_Mo_Kio_Constituency). In 1980, more part of the constituency was carved out to form [Cheng San](/wiki/Cheng_San_Constituency) and [Chong Boon constituencies](/wiki/Chong_Boon_Constituency). In 1988, the constituency was renamed as **Serangoon Gardens Single Member Constituency** (SMC) as part of Singapore's political reforms. In 1991, the constituency was abolished and merged into [Thomson Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Thomson_Group_Representation_Constituency). ## Member of Parliament YearIncumbentParty[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)**1959**Leong Keng Seng[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**R. A. Gonzales[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1968**Leonard Peter Rodrigo[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1972****1976**Lau Teik Soon**1980****1984****1988** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1959](/wiki/Singaporean_general_election,_1959): Serangoon Gardens PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Leong Keng Seng** **3,843** **48.93** [SPA](/wiki/Singapore_People%27s_Alliance)Eric Wee Sian Beng2,76435.19[PKMS](/wiki/Pertubuhan_Kebangsaan_Melayu_Singapura)Liao Ping85310.86[LF](/wiki/Labour_Front)Victor Louis Fernandez3304.20[LSP](/wiki/Liberal_Socialist_Party)Lilian Tan640.82Majority1,07913.74[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)8,631[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in 1970s [General Election 1976](/wiki/Singaporean_general_election,_1976): Serangoon Gardens PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Lau Teik Soon** **7,471** **68.74** [WP](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_(Singapore))C.
